img_summary: The image depicts an intense action scene from a video game, where a character is engaged in combat with a large creature amidst a cloud of dust and debris. The creature appears to be a rat-like figure, possibly the "Second Rat Prince," as indicated by the text on the screen. The character is wielding a weapon and is surrounded by various icons and health bars, suggesting gameplay elements such as abilities or items. The environment is a rocky, desert-like terrain, and the visual effects emphasize the dynamic nature of the battle.
